content: आप् {c5c} <ab>P.</ab> rarely {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> (आप्नोति or आपति, आप, आपत्, आप्स्यति, आप्तुं, आप्त) {@--1@} To obtain, attain, get; पुत्रमेवंगुणोपेतं चक्रवर्तिनमाप्नुहि <ls>Ś. 1. 12</ls>; अनुद्योगेन तैलानि तिलेभ्यो नाप्तुमर्हति <ls>H. Pr. 30</ls>; शतं क्रतुनामपविघ्नमाप सः <ls>R. 3. 38</ls>; so फलं, कीर्ति, सुखं &c. {@--2@} To reach, go to; overtake, meet, fall in with; शबरीमापतुर्वने <ls>Bk. 6. 59.</ls> {@--3@} To pervade, occupy, enter into. {@--4@} To undergo, suffer, meet with; दिष्टांतमाप्स्यति भवान् <ls>R. 9. 79</ls>; <ls>Ms. 8. 188.</ls> {@--5@} To equal. {%--<ab>pass.</ab>%} (आप्यते) {@--1@} To be reached, found, met with, obtained &c. {@--2@} To arrive at one's end or aim. {@--3@} To become filled. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} (आपयति) {@--1@} To cause to reach or obtain. {@--2@} To cause any one to feel or perceive. {@--3@} To hit.
